description: This file defines the 'StudentsScreen' widget, a stateful Flutter widget that manages displaying, searching, filtering, and manipulating a list of students in a kindergarten management system. It includes UI components like a search bar, class filter dropdown, student list, and FAB for adding new students. It interacts with 'StudentProvider' to load, filter, and delete student data.

classes.name: StudentsScreen
classes.description: Main widget for displaying and managing the list of students, including search, filtering, and CRUD operations.

methods.name: _showStudentForm
methods.description: Displays a dialog for adding or editing a student.

methods.name: _deleteStudent
methods.description: Prompts user for confirmation and deletes the selected student.
